name: Staple Wars
description:
A two weeks boss battle, top-down shooter game project created at NYFA game studio. The story is inspired by George Costanza character, in Seinfeld. George has to fight for his life versus the outraged machines of the office after a crazy office Halloween party. At the end, he has to defeat Amy her big blond boss.

Controls

  • Option to Move
  • Mouse pointer to navigate
  • Mouse click to shoot

Developers

Nina Mirhabibi - mirhabibinina.wix.com/portfolio

Brian Leung - BrianLeung698.wix.com/charmman
